about.company_desc: Almanzel-Alhadith is a company specializing in providing high-quality kitchen tools and hospitality equipment for homes, restaurants, and hotels.
about.product_1: Elegant glassware, cups, mugs, jars, and all tabletop essentials.
about.product_2: Decorative homeware, gifts, crystal items, and ornaments. Premium.
about.product_3: White porcelain and gold-accented porcelain for fine dining.
about.product_4: Durable stainless steel and high-grade metal kitchen tools.
about.product_5: Specialized equipment for meat, dairy, and cold storage.
about.product_6: Plastic kitchenware, including chopping boards and fridge containers.
about.we_desc: We combine functionality with refined aesthetics to meet the needs of both domestic and professional kitchens.

slider.premium_collection_desc: Unmatched quality and luxurious designs carefully selected to suit your refined taste.
slider.everything_you_need_desc: From knives to cookware, we provide all your kitchen essentials in one place.

essential_to_prep.title: New Products
essential_to_prep.description: Discover a wide range of home and kitchen tools at Tawfeer. Our selection features a variety of items including tea sets, coffee pots (Dallah), tea cups, cookware, and baking molds from top brands like Deqqa Qadima, Al-Attar, and Ne'ma. Perfect for enhancing your home and kitchen functionality, these high-quality tools meet all your culinary and household needs. Shop now at Tawfeer to find the best home and kitchenware that combines comfort and style in your living space.

top_rated.title: Top Selling Products
top_rated.description: Explore the products that have earned our customers' trust and received the highest ratings. Our carefully curated selection of home and kitchenware has been tested and approved by thousands of users, ensuring quality and innovation in every detail. We believe our community's feedback is the true standard of excellence, so we’ve handpicked the best based on real experiences that combine functional performance with elegant design.

offers.title: Grand Savings Offers
offers.description: Don't miss the chance to get the best home and kitchenware at exceptional prices. At Tawfeer, we combine high quality with true value through our ongoing offers on a wide range of tea sets, coffee pots, and bakeware.
